Submodules¶

investos.portfolio.backtest_controller module¶

class investos.portfolio.backtest_controller.BacktestController(strategy, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Container class that runs backtests using passed-in portfolio engineering strategy (see BaseStrategy), then saves results into result (see Result) class.
